description: The USA Basketball Youth & Sport Development Podcast is a four-part educational series on the USA Basketball philosophy for player development. So come, witness them maneuver their way to some “direct hits” — blunt opinions, sharp takes, and a delightful celebration of their love for the game — and having a free-wheeling, fun-loving, and ever so enjoyable conversation about your favorite sport.

title: Keeping It Real
description:
Be-Moor Radio introduces the latest vision for sport, "Keeping it Real" with Jonathan Lundy and Kevin Moore. This goes beyond the surface and takes a deep dive into the sports world. Keeping it Real is a sports show for everyone.

The year 2020 saw a unique side of sports that included activism that connected to the athletic heroes of the 1960's who forged an international interest in social justice. Keeping it Real will connect our audience with the real side of the athletes while bridging the gaps between the superstars and just everyday street legends. 

You'll hear the behind the scenes stories of the legendary University of Michigan's Fab Five as told by Chris Webber and Jimmy King. You'll also hear inspirational stories of athletes who are transforming their communities or experiencing success in business, education, government, etc. Keeping it Real will not be afraid to ask the critical questions like Black ownership, the misuse of high school and college athletes or when the pain is making others rich but destroying the athletes bodies.

DJ Zerocool is a Milwaukee-based DJ with ties to Vegas and Chicago while holding residences all over the US. He has worked with artists from every genre, Paul Oakenfold, Tommy Lee, Kid Rock, 2 Live Crew, BT, Kaskade, Bad Boy Bill, Tydi, Morgan Page, Willy Joy, X-Ecutioners, Robbie Rivera, the Crystal Method, Colette, DJ Yoda, Coolio, Ray Nitti to name a bunch.

Outside of djing, Zerocool is also an accomplished martial artist with backgrounds in Boxing, Muay Thai, Wrestling and Brazilian Jujitsu.  Training under the likes of Duke Roufus, Wanderlei Silva, Randy Couture, Carlson Gracie, Marc Montoya, and Rafael Lovato Jr.

title: OLI JAPÓN

Luego de que el mundo se detuvo en 2020, los ojos estarán puestos en el lugar en donde la llama olímpica se enciende después de la larga espera. 

Con nuevas disciplinas olímpicas como los e-sports, protocolos reforzados y una nueva normalidad; los juegos arrancan el próximo 23 de julio con altas expectativas de lo que sucederá no solo en términos deportivos sino de seguridad y salud para
los representantes de todos los países.

Por estas y más razones, seguro estas olimpiadas serántendencia y nosotros decimos ¡oli ツJapón!

DIG is the Diversity and Inclusion Group on campus. It was formed to allow athletes of all identities to feel welcome. title: 49ers y Radio Fórmula presentan: Fiel a México
description:
Escucha en español  semana a semana todo lo que pasa con tu equipo favorito de la NFL: Los 49ers de San Francisco. 

Desde el Levi 's Stadium, los veteranos locutores de radio en español, Jesús Zarate y Carlos Yustis, serán el dúo principal del podcast durante la temporada 2022 de la NFL. Zarate ha sido la voz de radio en español de los 49ers desde 2012, pero también ha cubierto a los San Francisco Giants, Golden State Warriors y San Jose Sharks. Yustis se desempeña simultáneamente como presentador de deportes para Telemundo 48 en el Área de la Bahía y anteriormente cubrió Super Bowls, Juegos Olímpicos y Mundiales de la FIFA. La experimentada de la radio, Mayra Gómez, también contribuirá a todo el contenido en español.

Los San Francisco 49ers, propiedad de Denise y John York, juegan actualmente en la división NFC West y han ganado cinco trofeos de Super Bowl, incluidos los Super Bowl XVI, XIX, XXIII, XXIV y XXIX. La franquicia también tiene siete campeonatos de conferencia y 20 campeonatos divisionales, y fue el primer equipo deportivo profesional de las grandes ligas que se basó en San Francisco hace 75 años.

Grupo Fórmula es un conglomerado de medios con más de 90 años de experiencia que ofrece contenido multimedia informativo de diferentes categorías. Radio Fórmula, su división de radio, es el grupo de radio principal en México, con acceso a más de 400 mercados en todo México. El grupo se complementa por: Telefórmula, canal de TV de paga con fuerte influencia y presencia en todo México, así como en los mercados hispanos más grandes de Estados Unidos; PM Onstreet, su medio Out-Of-Home y Formula Online, un ecosistema digital que ofrece una experiencia de usuario extraordinaria al abordar diferentes contenidos en cada plataforma.

title: Knicks Nation Podcast
description:
The Knicks have a rich and storied history in the NBA, making them a beloved team for fans both in New York and around the world. From their early days as a founding member of the league to their memorable championship runs in the 70s, the Knicks have left an indelible mark on basketball history.

This podcast is dedicated to exploring that history and examining the present and future of the Knicks. Hosted by passionate basketball fans with a deep knowledge of the team and the game, each episode will dive into a different aspect of Knicks lore, from the legends who have worn the orange and blue to the strategies that have led to success (and disappointment) over the years.

Listeners can expect in-depth analysis of the team's current roster, game previews and recaps, interviews with players and coaches, and plenty of laughs and debates along the way. Whether you're a die-hard Knicks fan or simply a lover of the game, this podcast will have something for you.

Join us as we explore the highs and lows of Knicks basketball, from the glory days of the past to the exciting possibilities of the future. This is the ultimate podcast for anyone who bleeds orange and blue.

Each week, we'll explore the latest news and trends in the golf world, from the PGA Tour to the amateur ranks and everything in between. We'll dive into the history of the game and take a closer look at some of golf's most iconic players, courses, and moments.

But we won't just talk about the pros - we'll also cover the game from the perspective of the everyday golfer, sharing tips and tricks to help you improve your game and enjoy the sport even more.

And of course, we'll have plenty of guests on the show, including top players, coaches, course designers, and other experts in the field. They'll share their insights and stories with us, giving us an inside look at what it's really like to play and work in the world of golf.

So, if you're a fan of golf - whether you're a seasoned pro or a casual player - "The Jeremy Callahan Show" is the podcast for you. Tune in each week for a lively and informative conversation about all things golf.

As sports enthusiasts and seasoned bettors, they bring a unique blend of expertise, humor, and vivacity to the table. Matt, a Virginia Tech alumnus and Flag Football MVP, is known for his betting skills that once led to a life-changing Las Vegas trip. Brittany, a gaming major from UNLV, adds to the dynamic with her diverse sports-focused background and Vegas know-how.

In addition to their betting prowess, they share an unbridled passion for Pickleball, exploring downtown Las Vegas, and bonding with their beloved pets. Tune in as they dive deep into the sports world, sharing valuable insights, predictions, and engaging betting advice. Whether you're new to sports betting or an old hand, looking for in-depth analysis or light-hearted sports banter, "Coffee and Capping" serves it all with a side of caffeine.

With a perfect blend of sports, betting, laughter, and a daily dose of coffee (or matcha for Brittany), "Coffee and Capping" is your go-to podcast for a unique and exhilarating sports betting experience. title: Calm F1 Podcast
description:
Welcome to the "Pre-Quali Podcast," where the exhilaration of F1 is dissected, discussed, and delivered straight to your ears every week. As the name suggests, we're all about laying the groundwork and offering in-depth analysis before each Grand Prix's qualifying session kicks off - we're the "pre-qualifying" to your race weekend!

We're more than just a Formula 1 podcast. We're a hub for all things F1, appealing to both die-hard fans and those new to the sport. From intricate technical breakdowns to historical retrospectives, to intriguing interviews with an array of guests, the Pre-Quali Podcast brings the F1 world to your doorstep.

Each episode kicks off with the latest driver news, focusing on everything from driver lineups, changes within teams, or even rumors from the paddock. Our analysis not only covers the surface-level headlines but digs deeper into the possible impacts and implications. We blend facts with engaging storytelling to ensure that you're not only informed but thoroughly entertained.

We also take our listeners on a thrilling ride through the annals of F1 history. We explore significant races, championship battles, and technical innovations that have shaped this high-octane sport over the decades. The past, present, and future of F1 intersect here in each riveting episode.

To bring our listeners even closer to the action, we're thrilled to regularly welcome a variety of guests on the show. From current and former drivers, team principals, to engineers, we dive into in-depth conversations, taking you behind the scenes of this exciting world. This is your golden ticket to get to know the personalities that make this sport great, up close and personal.

While the spotlight is undoubtedly on F1, we also make room to discuss the feeder series – F2, F3, and others. These are the proving grounds for future F1 stars, and we believe it's essential to highlight their progress and the intense competition within these series.

If predictions are your thing, then the Pre-Quali Podcast has got you covered. We'll weigh up the chances, analyze the possible strategies, and dare to predict the outcomes of each Grand Prix.

Last, but certainly not least, we aim to make the complex world of F1 more accessible to those who are new to the sport. We dedicate part of our show to explain key concepts and terminologies in F1, allowing newcomers to understand and appreciate the sport's technicalities and strategies better.

The "Pre-Quali Podcast" is your companion to the world of Formula 1, a dynamic, ever-evolving journey that gives you an insider's view into this thrilling sport. Whether you've been an F1 fan for years, or you're just getting started, the Pre-Quali Podcast is your pit-stop for comprehensive, engaging, and insightful F1 content. Buckle up and join us for this wild ride!
author_name: Peter Duke, Oliver Grooben, Harry Adams

title: Boring Baseball
description:
Welcome to "The Yawn-inducing Diamond," the podcast that delves deep into the world of baseball and uncovers why it has become tedious and boring.

Join us as we lift the curtain on America's pastime and explore the aspects that make the game feel like a never-ending snooze-fest. From sluggish gameplay to slow-paced strategies, we examine the reasons why baseball has lost its spark and captivation over the years.

With insightful discussions and thought-provoking analysis, we navigate through the complexities of lengthy games, repetitive plays, and unnecessary breaks that lead to disengagement and disinterest.

Each week, we dissect the lacklustre moments on the field, scrutinize the intricate rituals that elongate the game time, and propose innovative ideas to revitalize baseball for a modern audience. From pitch-count controversies to the never-ending inning breaks, we scrutinize the game's flaws in a lighthearted yet informative manner.

So, whether you're a die-hard fan or a curious observer curious about the charm that once captivated millions, "The Yawn-inducing Diamond" is your go-to podcast for exploring why baseball has lost its edge and what can be done to bring the excitement back to this timeless sport. Get ready to yawn, but not while listening to us!

title: NFL Flag Talk
description:
Introduction

  • Greetings, flag football enthusiasts! Welcome to the NFL Flag Talk Podcast, where we dive deep into the world of flag football.
  • Today, we're excited to recap the thrilling Annual Flag Summit, an event that brought together the flag football community like never before.

Key Highlights:

  1. Opening Ceremony (00:01:22)
    • We kicked off the summit with an inspiring opening ceremony, featuring renowned figures in the flag football world.
    • Highlighting the significance of flag football as an inclusive sport accessible to all.
  2. Workshops & Clinics (00:07:45):
    • In-depth workshops and clinics provided a learning playground for coaches and players.
    • Topics ranged from coaching techniques to player development, emphasizing skill-building.
  3. Guest Speakers (00:15:20):
    • Notable guest speakers, including flag football legends and experts, shared their wisdom.
    • Key insights on the growth and future of flag football.
  4. Youth Engagement (00:25:10):
    • An exciting segment dedicated to youth engagement initiatives.
    • Encouraging the next generation of flag football stars.
  5. Networking & Community (00:31:50):
    • The summit fostered networking opportunities, uniting flag football enthusiasts from all corners.
    • The power of community in advancing the sport.

Behind the Scenes:

  • Explore behind-the-scenes moments and interviews with organizers, speakers, and participants.

Future Outlook (00:42:15):

  • What lies ahead for flag football after this inspiring summit?
  • Hints at exciting developments and events to come.

Conclusion:

  • Thanks for tuning in to this episode of NFL Flag Talk Podcast.
  • Don't forget to like, subscribe, and share with fellow flag football enthusiasts!
  • Stay connected for more flag football insights, interviews, and exciting updates.

Outro:

  • Join us next time for another engaging episode. Until then, keep those flags flying high!
